question: The 2019 Military World Games has started in which city of China?
explanation: The 7th edition of Military World Games (MWG-2019) is being held from October 18–27 in Wuhan, China with theme \'Military Glory and Peace\'. It is for the first time that China is hosting the MWG, which is also known as Military Olympics.  In it, more than 10,000 military officials from over 140 counties, including India are expected to participate with a record-high 329 events across 27 sports. The first MWG was inaugurated in Rome in 1955, and since then, it is held in every 4 years by the International Military Sports Council (or CISM).
